description: Write n in base 2, complement each digit (d -> 1-d) and juxtapose.
comments: Complement of A030190 Champernowne sequence (or word): write n in base 2 and juxtapose. The decimal representation of this transformed constant is A180443. [_Jonathan Vos Post_, Sep 05 2010]
crossrefs: Cf. A030190, A180433. [_Jonathan Vos Post_, Sep 05 2010]
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Digit a(0)=0 added by _Jonathan Vos Post_, Sep 05 2010
